result_type.description: Determines whether to not change the initial item stack (`"unchanged"`), replace it with the item stack specified in the `result_stack` field (`"specified"`), replace it with the item stack from the top input slot of a Grindstone block (`"from_top"`) or replace it with the item stack from the bottom input slot of a Grindstone block (`"from_bottom"`).
result_type.markdownDescription: Determines whether to not change the initial item stack (`"unchanged"`), replace it with the item stack specified in the `result_stack` field (`"specified"`), replace it with the item stack from the top input slot of a Grindstone block (`"from_top"`) or replace it with the item stack from the bottom input slot of a Grindstone block (`"from_bottom"`).

entity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the player upon taking the item stack from the result slot of a Grindstone.
entity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the player upon taking the item stack from the result slot of a Grindstone.

block_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the Grindstone block upon taking the item stack from the result slot of the said Grindstone block.
block_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the Grindstone block upon taking the item stack from the result slot of the said Grindstone block.

item_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the result item stack.
item_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the result item stack.

item_action_after_grinding.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the result item stack *_after_* the grinding process.
item_action_after_grinding.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the result item stack *_after_* the grinding process.

top_condition.description: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if the item stack from the top input slot of the Grindstone fulfills this condition.
top_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if the item stack from the top input slot of the Grindstone fulfills this condition.

bottom_condition.description: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if the item stack from the bottom input slot of the Grindstone fulfills this condition.
bottom_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if the item stack from the bottom input slot of the Grindstone fulfills this condition.

output_condition.description: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if the item stack from the output/result slot of the Grindstone fulfills this condition.
output_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if the item stack from the output/result slot of the Grindstone fulfills this condition.

result_stack.description: If specified, this item stack will be used as a replacement only if the `result_type` field has a value of `"specified"`.
result_stack.markdownDescription: If specified, this item stack will be used as a replacement only if the `result_type` field has a value of `"specified"`.

xp_modifier.description: If specified, this modifier will be applied to the value of the experience received from removing an enchantment from an item stack.
xp_modifier.markdownDescription: If specified, this modifier will be applied to the value of the experience received from removing an enchantment from an item stack.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Modify Grindstone (Power Type) date: 2022-07-03

Modify Grindstone

Power Type

Modifies the result of a certain item upon repairing/removing the enchantments of the said item using a Grindstone.

Type ID: origins:modify_grindstone

Fields

Field Type Default Description
result_type String "unchanged" Determines whether to not change the initial item stack ("unchanged"), replace it with the item stack specified in the result_stack field ("specified"), replace it with the item stack from the top input slot of a Grindstone block ("from_top") or replace it with the item stack from the bottom input slot of a Grindstone block ("from_bottom").
entity_action Entity Action Type optional If specified, this action will be executed on the player upon taking the item stack from the result slot of a Grindstone.
block_action Block Action Type optional If specified, this action will be executed on the Grindstone block upon taking the item stack from the result slot of the said Grindstone block.
item_action Item Action Type optional If specified, this action will be executed on the result item stack.
item_action_after_grinding Item Action Type optional If specified, this action will be executed on the result item stack after the grinding process.
top_condition Item Condition Type optional If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if the item stack from the top input slot of the Grindstone fulfills this condition.
bottom_condition Item Condition Type optional If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if the item stack from the bottom input slot of the Grindstone fulfills this condition.
output_condition Item Condition Type optional If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if the item stack from the output/result slot of the Grindstone fulfills this condition.
result_stack Item Stack optional If specified, this item stack will be used as a replacement only if the result_type field has a value of "specified".
xp_modifier Attribute Modifier optional If specified, this modifier will be applied to the value of the experience received from removing an enchantment from an item stack.

Examples

{
    "type": "origins:modify_grindstone",
    "xp_modifier": {
        "operation": "multiply_total_multiplicative",
        "value": 0.5
    }
}

This example will increase the experience recieved from removing enchantments from an enchanted item to 50%. 

{
    "type": "origins:modify_grindstone",
    "result_type": "specified",
    "block_action": {
        "type": "origins:set_block",
        "block": "minecraft:air"
    },
    "output_condition": {
        "type": "origins:ingredient",
        "ingredient": {
            "item": "minecraft:diamond_sword"
        }
    },
    "result_stack": {
        "item": "minecraft:netherite_sword"
    }
}

This example will replace the item in the output/result slot of a Grindstone with a Netherite Sword if the initial item is a Diamond Sword. This will also remove the used Grindstone block after taking the said item.
